white-space: normal (default)

Multiple spaces and line breaks are collapsed.

white-space: nowrap

This text will not wrap and will overflow if too long for container.

Spaces are preserved. Line breaks too.

white-space: pre-wrap

Spaces preserved but text wraps when needed at container edge.

white-space: pre-line

Multiple spaces collapse. But line breaks are preserved.

text-overflow: ellipsis

This is a very long text that should be truncated with an ellipsis when it overflows the container.
